# [IHeartRadio](https://iheart.com)

IHeartRadio Provider

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: IHeartRadio
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: iheart.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
